citations.narrative:
An enclosure with one dog has an igloo-type dog house that is broken and cracked along the wind tunnel and the roof.
Portions of the doghouse are missing. This structure is no longer in good repair. Licensee must repair or replace the
doghouse to ensure that all housing provided for the dogs is structurally sound and maintained to be kept in good repair.
To be completed by: 8/22/23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(a) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
An enclosure with one dog has an igloo-type dog house that is broken and cracked along the wind tunnel and the roof. 
Portions of the doghouse are missing. This structure is no longer in good repair. Licensee must repair or replace the 
doghouse to ensure that all housing provided for the dogs is structurally sound and maintained to be kept in good repair. 
 
To be completed by: 8/22/23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
 n
